metadata.title: CVE-2024-0199 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An authorization bypass vulnerability was discovered in GitLab affectingversions 11.3 prior to 16.7.7, 16.7.6 prior to 16.8.4, and 16.8.3 prior to16.9.2. An attacker could bypass CODEOWNERS by utilizing a crafted payloadin an old feature branch to perform malicious actions.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
